title: Bug 123404Predefine style shouldn't be listed in the style list
description: Bug 123404Predefine style shouldn't be listed in the style list
OB: Description:Predefine style shouldn't be listed in the style listSteps to reproduce:1.Add a label2.New a predefine style named "label", set font color to red3.New a text, select itExpected result:The predefine style can't apply to the text through any wayActual result:In property editor or properties sheet, the style list lists the predefine style, and it can be applied to the textNote: In context menu, predefine style is invisible for the text
